sentences.en: As operational and financial stresses mounted, morale began to unravel.
sentences.cn: 随着经营和财务压力升级, 士气低落.

sentences.en: At warmer temperatures, nucleic acids unravel and cell membranes quickly dissolve.
sentences.cn: 在更高温度下, 核酸会散开,细胞膜也会迅速溶解.

sentences.en: Children unravel the world; adults try to knit it back together.
sentences.cn: 当孩童拆散世界时, 成人试著去将它重新接合起来.

sentences.en: Detectives are still trying to unravel the mystery surrounding his death.
sentences.cn: 侦探们仍在试图解开他的死亡之谜。

sentences.en: He could unravel a knot that others wouldn't even attempt.
sentences.cn: 他能解开其他人甚至不敢尝试的绳结。

sentences.en: It had been used for practical ends, to identify elements and to unravel radioactive decay chains.
sentences.cn: 已将其用于实践的目的, 去鉴别元素和阐明放射性衰变系.

sentences.en: Page after page is strewn with notes that the ear cannot possibly unravel.
sentences.cn: 一页接一页的乐谱中都散布着用耳朵分不清的音符.

sentences.en: The company started to unravel when two of the directors were arrested.
sentences.cn: 两名董事被捕以后，公司开始分崩离析。

sentences.en: The End Times , when all of creation will finally unravel, are here.
sentences.cn: 所有造物最终粉碎的终结时刻就在眼前.

sentences.en: The stairway carpet is so frayed it threatens to unravel.
sentences.cn: 铺在楼梯上的地毯磨损得很厉害，都快散了。

sentences.en: There is still a good deal to unravel.
There was still more to discover, more mysteries unravel.
sentences.cn: 还有更多的发现, 更多的谜团解开.

sentences.en: This is the attitude that led to unravel a mystery that long puzzled Chinese historians.
sentences.cn: 正是这种态度使他解决了长期以来使中国历史学家们大惑不解的谜.

sentences.en: Those studies should help unravel the basic biology of obesity.
sentences.cn: 这些研究将有助于阐明肥胖的基本生物学改变.

sentences.en: Visit far away lands and unravel the mysteries on an epic journey.
sentences.cn: 访问遥远的土地和解开谜团在史诗般的旅程.

sentences.en: What moves him is the desire to unravel the mysteries of nature.
sentences.cn: 推动他们的还是解开自然之迷的愿望.

sentences.en: Within hours things began to unravel.
sentences.cn: 在几个小时内,事情开始揭晓了.

sentences.en: You may need a therapist to unravel and work on the issues.
sentences.cn: 也可能需要医生找出原因来解决此问题.

trans.tran_en: to understand or explain something that is mysterious or complicated
